name: Ground Control (itch) (farfocelli)
description:
Hello There!

This is my first game. It is a low budget rocket flight simulator, created for Nokia3310Jam. 

Controls: KeyFunctions[5]enter, full throttle[7],[9]scroll up[1],[3]scroll down[8],[2]adjust value slowly[4],[6]vadjust value faster[+],[-] adjust value the fastest[0]back to the settings menu Tips:

If you can't liftoff, then you:

  • shrinked the size and increased the mass of the planet so much, that you made a black hole;

or,

  • set the thrust too low;
Units: VariableUnitRocket HeightmThrustkNBurn TimesStart MasskgEnd Masskg
Planet Mass10^24 kgPlanet Radiuskm
